info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: attaches annotations to a CSV file

param.name: targetFile
param.description: path to char-separated table file with header

param.name: targetSep
param.description: separating char in the annotation file(s)

param.name: outputFile
param.description: path to the annotated output file

param.name: targetIDcolumn
param.description: name of the column of the target file that should be used to merge the table with the annotation file(s)

param.name: annotationIDcolumn
param.description: name(s) of the column(s) of the annotation file(s) that should be used to merge the table with the annotation file(s)

param.name: annotationFile
param.description: path(s) to annotation table file(s) that should be attached

param.name: annotationSep
param.description: separating char in the target file
